# MajorValueAlignment

**Structure**

A type that defines how the valigned aligned chart scroll target behavior aligns to major values on swipe.

## Declaration

```swift
struct MajorValueAlignment<Value> where Value : Plottable
```

## Type Properties

- **page**: Automatically set the major aligment unit to be the size of the visible domain which is equivalent to a page.

## Type Methods

- **matching(_:)**: Align to calendar components.
- **unit(_:)**: Align to units.

## Supporting types

- **ValueAlignedLimitBehavior**: A type that defines the amount of marks that can be scrolled at a time.
- **ValueAlignedChartScrollTargetBehavior**: A scroll target behavior that aligns to values spaced at regular intervals along the scrollable axes.
